category=分类
orderType=排序0相关性1上架时间2更新时间3观看量4收藏量
excludeTags=屏蔽标签
includeTags=标签
finished=0连载1完结
source=1原创首发2会员上传

*若要使用自己账号，请用浏览器打开UAA官网(https://www.uaa.com)登录，推荐使用Reqable软件抓包自己账号的token，把本源的↓请求头↓的token换掉即可。

eval(String(source.bookSourceComment)); var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result), $1 = key => String(J.select('[property="og:' + key + '"]').attr("content")), $2 = key => String(J.select(key).text()), $3 = key => String(J.select(key).attr("data-original")), url = baseUrl, s = $2(".detail-list-title-1").replace(/中|已/g, ""), k =$2(".detail-main-info-author:nth-child(4) a") +"," + $2(".detail-main-info-class a"), l = $2(".detail-list-1 li:last-child a"), t = $2(".detail-list-title-3").replace(/更新/g, ""), count = J.select(".detail-list-1 li").length; book = { name: $2(".detail-main-info-title").replace(/[（\(].*/, ""), author: $2(".detail-main-info-author:nth-child(3)") .replace(/[,xX&]|[图文][:：]/g, "/") .replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, "/"), kind: s + "," + k + "," + t, latest: l + "·" + t + "·[" + count + "]", intro: "
" + $2("p.detail-desc").replace(/.*内容介绍[:：].*/g, "") .replace(/(^|[。！？!?]+["”」）】]?)/g, "$1
"), cover: $3(".detail-main-cover img").replace(/http:/, "https:"), url: url, durl: "" }; result = JSON.stringify(book);
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".manga-list-2 li"),
  $ = key => String(list[i].select(key).text()),
  data = [];
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    name: $(".manga-list-2-title a"),
    author: $(".book-list-info-bottom-item").replace(/[,xX&]|[图文][:：]/g, "/")
      .replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, "/").replace(/^[\/]/g, ""),
    kind: "",
    word: "",
    latest: $(".manga-list-2-tip a").replace(/已更新\s/, ""),
    intro: "",
    cover: String(list[i].select("img").attr("data-original")).replace(/http:/, "https:"),
    url: list[i].select("a").attr("href")
  });
}
result = JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[*]
ruleExplore.name: $.name

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".book-list li"),
  $ = key => String(list[i].select(key).text()),
  data = [];
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    name: $(".book-list-info-title"),
    author: $(".book-list-info-bottom-item")
      .replace(/[,xX&]|[图文][:：]/g, "/").replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, "/")
      .replace(/^[\/]/g, ""),
    kind: $(".book-list-info-bottom-right-font").replace(/[中已]/,""),
    word: "",
    latest: "",
    intro:$(".book-list-info-desc"),
    cover: String(list[i].select(".book-list-cover-img").attr("data-original"))
      .replace(/http:/, "https:"),
    url: list[i].select("a").attr("href")
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[*]
ruleSearch.name: $.name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //月份 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //日 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //小时 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //分 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //秒 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //季度 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //毫秒 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".detail-list-1 li a"),
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    title:
      i == list.length - 1 ? `${list[i].text()}〔${date}〕` : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
1 == flag
  ? (java.put("Enable", 1), JSON.stringify(data))
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>
$[*]
